verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and prophesy against <S%H5012>it<s%>,

and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>it<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H2022>Behold<s%>, I am against thee, O mount <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5414>thee<s%>, and I will make thee a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment<s%>.
I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Because thou hast had a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%>, and hast <S%H5064>given<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>, in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>;

therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thee unto <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H518>thee<s%>: since thou hast not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, therefore <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pursue <S%H7291>thee<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H8077>an<s%> <S%H8077>astonishment<s%> and a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>; and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it him that passeth through and him that <S%H7725>returneth<s%>.

And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> its <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with its <S%H2491>slain<s%>: in thy <S%H1389>hills<s%> and in thy <S%H1516>valleys<s%> and in all thy <S%H650>watercourses<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall not be <S%H7725>inhabited<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Because thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall be <S%H3423>mine<s%>, and we will possess <S%H3068>it<s%>; whereas Jehovah was there:

therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, I will <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and according to thine <S%H7068>envy<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> out of thy <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against <S%H3045>them<s%>; and I will make myself known among <S%H8199>them<s%>, when I shall judge thee.

And thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H8085>heard<s%> all thy <S%H5007>revilings<s%> which thou hast <S%H559>spoken<s%> against the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They are laid <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, they are <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>devour<s%>.
And ye have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> yourselves against me with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> against <S%H8085>me<s%>: I have heard it.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: When the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%>, I will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.

As thou didst <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> over the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because it was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H8077>thee<s%>: thou shalt be desolate, O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and all <S%H123>Edom<s%>, even all of <S%H3045>it<s%>; and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
